name: Agent Run Return In Vector City - Best Vector Game
name_original: Agent Run Return In Vector City - Best Vector Game
description:
********Love the music & groovy colors by pukkanews
Simple yet engaging. The running with peppy music is so much fun. I find myself coming back to it.

———AGENT RUN AND DASH IS BACK———

————One of the most thrilling and exciting gameplay that would boost you————

For the second time, the secret agent is back entering the city of criminals and is caught detecting their secret plans and strategies.

He is looking forward to escape this evil and criminal city as fast as he could.

help him to escape and survive

Gameplay :

• Tap to jump
• Hold longer to jump higher
